import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{productService}from'../../services/productService';import ProductForm from'../../components/seller/ProductForm';import ErrorMessage from'../../components/common/ErrorMessage';import{getErrorMessage}from'../../utils/helpers';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddProduct=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState('');const[step,setStep]=useState(1);// 1: Request OTP, 2: Verify OTP
const[otp,setOtp]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[productData,setProductData]=useState(null);const handleRequestOTP=async formData=>{setLoading(true);setError('');setMessage('');try{const response=await productService.requestProductCreationOTP(formData);setProductData(formData);setMessage(response.data.message);setStep(2);}catch(err){setError(getErrorMessage(err));}finally{setLoading(false);}};const handleVerifyOTP=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');try{await productService.verifyOTPAndCreateProduct(otp);alert('Product created successfully!');navigate('/seller/products');}catch(err){setError(getErrorMessage(err));}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-50 py-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto px-4 max-w-4xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-8",children:"Add New Product"}),step===1?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{message:error,onClose:()=>setError('')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductForm,{onSubmit:handleRequestOTP,loading:loading})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{message:error,onClose:()=>setError('')}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200 text-blue-800 px-4 py-3 rounded-lg mb-4",children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Verify OTP"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mb-6",children:"An OTP has been sent to the admin. Please contact the admin to get the OTP."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleVerifyOTP,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2",children:"Enter OTP *"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:otp,onChange:e=>setOtp(e.target.value),required:true,maxLength:"6",placeholder:"Enter 6-digit OTP",className:"w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-center text-2xl tracking-widest"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>setStep(1),className:"flex-1 bg-gray-300 text-gray-700 py-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-gray-400",children:"Back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,className:"flex-1 bg-blue-600 text-white py-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 disabled:bg-gray-400",children:loading?'Verifying...':'Verify & Create Product'})]})]})]})]})});};export default AddProduct;
